text: "Cowboy Casanova" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her third studio album, Play On (2009). ==Music video== The music video for "Cowboy Casanova" was directed by Theresa Wingert. It premiered on CMT on October 2, 2009. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for seven consecutive weeks. ==References== Category:2009 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Cowboy Casanova
